original_text: When Jesus had finished saying all this to the people who were listening, he entered Capernaum.
korean_text: 예수께서 모든 말씀을 백성에게 들려 주시기를 마치신 후에 가버나움으로 들어가시니라

sentences.original_text: When Jesus had finished saying all this
sentences.korean_translation: 예수께서 이 모든 말씀을 마치셨을 때

sentences.original_text: to the people who were listening
